name: Julie Olson
what_you_do: Provides a whole-body approach to addressing the root causes of hair loss and helping clients regrow healthy hair naturally.
social_proof: Recognized as one of the Top 23 to Watch in the Health and Wellness Space, Julie Olson is renowned for her rigorous research and unwavering commitment to women's health.
business_focus: Helping women overcome hair loss and restore their overall health through a whole-body approach.
service_provided: Hair loss solutions, functional nutrition, personalized case analysis
